overview:
Nimisha is a scientist, self taught UX designer, girl gamer, farmers market fan, and perfectionist. As the CEO of Glamour Games, Nimisha plays the role of a product manager, designer, creative, and coffee-runner.

Prior to co-founding Glamour Games, Nimisha founded Club Dine In. Club Dine In was a hub to bring sustainable food and people together and has raised over $5000 for Doctors Without Borders.

Nimisha has worked in stimulant addictions research at UCLA and Baylor College of Medicine prior to entering the tech world. She has run several studies, secured grants and applications, worked with FDA, and is published.

Nimisha holds a B.S. in Pyschobiology from University of California, Los Angeles.
